div.p: ( A) Monthly average sea ice extents in the Bellingshausen/Amundsen Seas, 1979â€“2018. February extents are colored red, September extents green, and all others black. ( Inset) The 40-y average annual cycle. ( B) Monthly deviations, with the line of linear least squares fit and its slope and SD. ( C) Yearly averages and their line of linear least squares fit.
